google_translated: I and ... Can I get together!

en_text: Whatever.
jp_text: なんだこれ

en_text: The swords are here.
jp_text: 刀が…来た

en_text: You like them?
jp_text: どうだい？気に入った？

en_text: Bro looks so happy.
jp_text: あにき 嬉しそうだな

en_text: They've been through harsh fates  no normal human could even imagine.
jp_text: こいつらは 常人には想像もつかない過酷な運命を辿ってきたんだ
google_translated: These guys have followed harsh destiny who can not imagine

en_text: And it's not over for them yet.
jp_text: きっとこれから先もな

en_text: There was no place for you by his side  to begin with.
jp_text: どのみちお前が入り込む余地はなかった
google_translated: There was no room to get in front of me

en_text: No doubt about that. Dealing with  ghouls like that all the time.
jp_text: そりゃああんなバケモンばっかり相手してるんじゃ 無理だがね
google_translated: Well, that stupid Bakemon is not good enough

en_text: -Don't rub your head on people anymore.  -Why?
jp_text: 百様！もうあんまり人におでこくっつけちゃぁダメやよ？

en_text: Because it'll go pear-shaped!
jp_text: なぜもヘチマもねぇの！

en_text: Let's get going then, bro.
jp_text: それじゃ そろそろ行くかい あにき
google_translated: Well then I will go there soon

en_text: You go with me.
jp_text: どろろも一緒だ

en_text: Duh. I'm the only one  who can handle this journey with you.
jp_text: 当たり前だろ？あにきと旅ができるのはおいらだけなんだから
google_translated: of course?Because it is only good to be able to journey

en_text: Born into this world
jp_text: 救いなどない

en_text: There is no salvation
jp_text: 生まれ落ちてきた

en_text: The distorted shape of the heart
jp_text: 歪な心の形に

en_text: Yet it beats courageously
jp_text: 勇ましい鼓動の叫び

en_text: There is no turning back
jp_text: 振り向きやしない

en_text: Even from the path of evil
jp_text: 修羅の道だって
google_translated: It is the way of the shura

en_text: Witnessing the withering seasons
jp_text: 枯れ行く季節など越えて

en_text: We search for the truth
jp_text: 確かな答えを探した
google_translated: I searched for a certain answer

en_text: As we peel back the skin
jp_text: この皮も剥がしてしまったの
google_translated: This skin has also peeled off

en_text: We are forever tormented by our stupidity
jp_text: ああ　いつだって　愚かさに苛まれているの
google_translated: Oh, always is annoyed for foolishness

en_text: But if the dawn never comes
jp_text: でもさあ　辛くなって

en_text: Through the painful night
jp_text: 終わらない夜ならば
google_translated: If it is not over at night

en_text: You who distrusts nothing
jp_text: きっと 疑わぬあなた

en_text: You will be able to love    this accursed world
jp_text: 呪われた世界を愛せるから
google_translated: Because I love the cursed world

en_text: Now that we carry the world    on our shoulders
jp_text: すべてを背負って　今
